channel.title: Pod Shopping Network
channel.description: The best deals on the internet delivered each week directly to your iPod or MP3 player.
channel.itunes:subtitle: On Demand Shopping
channel.itunes:author: PodShopping Network
channel.itunes:summary: The best deals on the internet delivered each week directly to your iPod or MP3 player.

item.title: Pod Shopping Network for August 7, 2006
item.description: This is the back to school edition of the Pod Shopping Network. Listen to this program to find the best places on the internet to go for all of your back to school needs. It's that time of year again so listen to our podcast and be prepared.
item.dc:creator: PodShopping Network
item.itunes:summary: This is the back to school edition of the Pod Shopping Network. Listen to this program to find the best places on the internet to go for all of your back to school needs. It's that time of year again so listen to our podcast and be prepared.
